sentences.en: After Van Persie's two goals Scolari must have been bemused.

sentences.en: In France any mention of exercise tends to provoke a bemused reaction.

sentences.en: The Pentagon is watching China's aircraft - carrier ambitions with bemused interest.

sentences.en: The singer still seems somewhat bemused at O's massive success.

sentences.en: The zebra was also fairly bemused by her new surroundings.

sentences.en: They all sat still, all bemused by the beauty of the thing.
sentences.cn: 他们都寂然不动地坐着, 冥想这个东西多么好.
